### createMCSymbolForTlsGetAddr() {#abfcac3a9ee111cfe8a6df190086ca997}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MCSymbol &#42; createMCSymbolForTlsGetAddr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp; Ctx, unsigned MIOpc)</>}

<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="comment">/// PrintAsmOperand - Print out an operand for an inline asm expression.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#a0bbac805be0153c6ba2c002e08a77388"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#a0bbac805be0153c6ba2c002e08a77388">PPCAsmPrinter::PrintAsmOperand</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpNo,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ExtraCode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;O) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Does this asm operand have a single letter operand modifier?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtraCode &amp;&amp; ExtraCode&#91;0&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;L&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">: </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write second word of DImode reference.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OpNo).isReg() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">          OpNo+1 == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getNumOperands() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++OpNo;   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the high-part.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write &#39;i&#39; if an integer constant, otherwise nothing.  Used to print</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// addi vs add, etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OpNo).isImm())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">        O &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;i&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;x&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This operand uses VSX numbering.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the operand is a VMX register, convert it to a VSX register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OpNo).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a5436d12d95e36064db97636d22f20988">PPC::isVRRegister</a>(Reg))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">        Reg = PPC::VSX32 + (Reg - PPC::V0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#acc7a469d7d5e4183e2b84d15072786cf">PPC::isVFRegister</a>(Reg))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">        Reg = PPC::VSX32 + (Reg - PPC::VF0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/ve/lvlgen-cpp/#a0a198e38a5def54ba58bebc655eda8e7">RegName</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For non-TOC-based local-&#91;exec|dynamic&#93; variables that have a non-zero offset,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we need to create a new MCExpr that adds the non-zero offset to the address</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the local-&#91;exec|dynamic&#93; variable that will be used in either an addi,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// load or store. However, the final displacement for these instructions must be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// between &#91;-32768, 32768), so if the TLS address + its non-zero offset is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// greater than 32KB, a new MCExpr is produced to accommodate this situation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae7810a05a90e7fc6d13fa85c0242ab5f"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae7810a05a90e7fc6d13fa85c0242ab5f">PPCAsmPrinter::getAdjustedFasterLocalExpr</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Non-zero offsets (for loads, stores or &#96;addi&#96;) require additional handling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When the offset is zero, there is no need to create an adjusted MCExpr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// non-zero offset to the TLS variable address.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a7c9a3fd165029985d3d43de5226da4e3">PPCAsmPrinter::emitEndOfAsmFile</a>(M);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><Highlight kind="comment">/// EmitFunctionBodyStart - Emit a global entry point prefix for ELFv2.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppclinuxasmprinter/#a0e3f4587b93083fdc01e3ec8f66b3701"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppclinuxasmprinter/#a0e3f4587b93083fdc01e3ec8f66b3701">PPCLinuxAsmPrinter::emitFunctionBodyStart</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the ELFv2 ABI, in functions that use the TOC register, we need to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// provide two entry points.  The ABI guarantees that when calling the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// local entry point, r2 is set up by the caller to contain the TOC base</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for this function, and when calling the global entry point, r12 is set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// up by the caller to hold the address of the global entry point.  We</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2092"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// thus emit a prefix sequence along the following lines:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2093"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// func:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// .Lfunc&#95;gepNN:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         # global entry point</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         addis r2,r12,(.TOC.-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN)@ha</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         addi  r2,r2,(.TOC.-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN)@l</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// .Lfunc&#95;lepNN:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         .localentry func, .Lfunc&#95;lepNN-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         # local entry point, followed by function body</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the Large code model, we create</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// .Lfunc&#95;tocNN:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         .quad .TOC.-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN      # done by EmitFunctionEntryLabel</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// func:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// .Lfunc&#95;gepNN:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         # global entry point</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         ld    r2,.Lfunc&#95;tocNN-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN(r12)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         add   r2,r2,r12</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// .Lfunc&#95;lepNN:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         .localentry func, .Lfunc&#95;lepNN-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         # local entry point, followed by function body</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This ensures we have r2 set up correctly while executing the function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// body, no matter which entry point is called.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo">PPCFunctionInfo</a> &#42;PPCFI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getInfo&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo">PPCFunctionInfo</a>&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UsesX2OrR2 = !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getRegInfo().use&#95;empty(PPC::X2) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><Highlight kind="normal">                          !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getRegInfo().use&#95;empty(PPC::R2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PCrelGEPRequired = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isUsingPCRelativeCalls() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><Highlight kind="normal">                                UsesX2OrR2 &amp;&amp; PPCFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a6017bce5768f09c7cdbe312e90962dda">usesTOCBasePtr</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NonPCrelGEPRequired = !<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isUsingPCRelativeCalls() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2124"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isELFv2ABI() &amp;&amp; UsesX2OrR2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only do all that if the function uses R2 as the TOC pointer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the first place. We don&#39;t need the global entry point if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function uses R2 as an allocatable register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NonPCrelGEPRequired || PCrelGEPRequired) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2130"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: The logic here must be synchronized with the code in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2131"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branch-selection pass which sets the offset of the first block in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2132"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function. This matters because it affects the alignment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><Highlight kind="normal">                              GlobalEntryLabelExp, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#aa7625af893e242d33b9f182066f59310">OutContext</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppctargetstreamer">PPCTargetStreamer</a> &#42;TS =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppctargetstreamer">PPCTargetStreamer</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac189a157a6aab76ea837c13ec615dbc9">OutStreamer</a>-&gt;getTargetStreamer());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><Highlight kind="normal">    TS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppctargetstreamer/#a9a17fcc857e0a6ffca2cb0b635394beb">emitLocalEntry</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;MCSymbolELF&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#aa06f7388d0cc9b44ece08cdf56c0ecf0">CurrentFnSym</a>), LocalOffsetExp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isUsingPCRelativeCalls()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When generating the entry point for a function we have a few scenarios</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// based on whether or not that function uses R2 and whether or not that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function makes calls (or is a leaf function).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) A leaf function that does not use R2 (or treats it as callee-saved</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    and preserves it). In this case st&#95;other=0 and both</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    the local and global entry points for the function are the same.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    No special entry point code is required.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) A function uses the TOC pointer R2. This function may or may not have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    calls. In this case st&#95;other=&#91;2,6&#93; and the global and local entry</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    points are different. Code to correctly setup the TOC pointer in R2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    is put between the global and local entry points. This case is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    covered by the if statatement above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3) A function does not use the TOC pointer R2 but does have calls.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    In this case st&#95;other=1 since we do not know whether or not any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    of the callees clobber R2. This case is dealt with in this else if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    block. Tail calls are considered calls and the st&#95;other should also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    be set to 1 in that case as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 4) The function does not use the TOC pointer but R2 is used inside</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    the function. In this case st&#95;other=1 once again.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 5) This function uses inline asm. We mark R2 as reserved if the function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    has inline asm as we have to assume that it may be used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getFrameInfo().hasCalls() || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getFrameInfo().hasTailCall() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;hasInlineAsm() || (!PPCFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a6017bce5768f09c7cdbe312e90962dda">usesTOCBasePtr</a>() &amp;&amp; UsesX2OrR2)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// translates into a relocation entry from &#96;foo&#96; to&#96; bar&#96;. The referring</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3284" lineLink="#aae503fa1c7f4a8a7c5e372e0948ab4f8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::string <a href="#aae503fa1c7f4a8a7c5e372e0948ab4f8">convertToSinitPriority</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Priority) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3285"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This helper function converts clang init priority to values used in sinit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3286"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and sterm functions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3287"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3288"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The conversion strategies are:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3289"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We map the reserved clang/gnu priority range &#91;0, 100&#93; into the sinit/sterm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3290"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reserved priority range &#91;0, 1023&#93; by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3291"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - directly mapping the first 21 and the last 20 elements of the ranges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3292"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - linear interpolating the intermediate values with a step size of 16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3293"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3294"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We map the non reserved clang/gnu priority range of &#91;101, 65535&#93; into the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3295"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sinit/sterm priority range &#91;1024, 2147483648&#93; by:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3296"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - directly mapping the first and the last 1024 elements of the ranges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3297"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - linear interpolating the intermediate values with a step size of 33878</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3298"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = <a href="#af564596581c06587b39c6a9cae3a859d">mapToSinitPriority</a>(Priority);</Highlight></CodeLine>
